name: Dodgeball
description: The "Dodgeball" game mode
author: allejo

name: All Hands On Deck
description: The All Hands On Deck game mode
author: allejo

name: Last Tank Standing
description: Game mode where the last tank standing wins the match
author: allejo

name: Capture the Base
description: Prevents players from picking their own team flag up. Also it flag resets (unused) when a flag is captured
author: flying_popcorn

name: Safe Genocide
description: A Genocide-like flag without the mass killing
author: allejo

name: Extra Point Flags
description: Kills made with these flags count towards extra points. Includes hundredPoint, triplePoint, and doublePoint
author: I_Died_Once

name: Grenade
description: Shooting with the Grenade flag generates a delayed detonation in front of you, where the detonation distance is controlled by your tank speed
author: Pac-Man

name: Reverse Geno
description: Allows a player to genocide the other team by being shot
author: asinck

name: Useless Mine
description: Allows players to place mines by grabbing the Useless flag
author: allejo

name: Risky Geno
description: A player who dies while holding Genocide will have his whole team obliterated
author: L4m3r

name: Geno Once
description: Causes a player to drop a Genocide flag when they make a kill with it
author: L4m3r

name: Team Flag Geno
description: Makes team flags behave like Genocide flags when held by a member of their respective teams
author: L4m3r

name: Mapped Death Zones
description: Introduces basic spawning logic based on where a player died
author: allejo

name: Auto Team Balance
description: Switches players to another team during gameplay without the need for a respawn or rejoin. Also allows for auto team balancing
author: allejo

name: CTF Overseer
description: Oversees the fairness and features of CTF
author: allejo

name: Demilitarized Zones
description: Adds zones to maps where shots are rendered harmless
author: allejo

name: Flag Reset On Cap
description: Resets all the flags on the map when a flag is captured except for the team flags
author: allejo

name: Shot Limit Zone
description: Allows you add shot limits to flags based on the location where they are picked up
author: allejo

name: Spawn At Base
description: Force players to spawn at a custom base object instead of their respective bases
author: allejo

name: Capture Bonus
description: Awards a static bonus to players who capture the flag
author: allejo

name: Checkpoint
description: Save a player's spawn location when they reach checkpoints
author: allejo

name: Bounty Hunter
description: Rewards those bounty hunters who are always going after the players on a rampage
author: allejo

name: Timed Flag On Spawn
description: Gives player a flag on spawn, but takes it away shortly after
author: allejo

name: Useless Rampage
description: Gives some use to the Useless flag where it will award as many points as your current killing spree
author: allejo

name: Spawn Facing the Center
description: Modifies all spawns to face the dead center of the map (0, 0, z)
author: L4m3r

name: VPN Blocker
description: Query VPN detection services to auto-kick players on VPNs
author: allejo

name: Persistent Mute
description: Persists mutes after a player rejoins
author: allejo

name: Player Join Handler
description: Help avoid disruptions during matches
author: allejo

name: BZDB Lock
description: Disallows anyone with the /set permission to change certain variables
author: allejo

name: Muted Chat Helper
description: Allows muted players to send several pre-determined messages
author: macsforme

name: Admin Listener
description: Forwards team chat and private messages between players to observer admins
author: macsforme

name: Server Control
description: Fork of the original serverControl BZFlag plug-in with capabilities to reload more than just ban files
author: allejo

name: Relative BZDB Values
description: A BZFlag plugin to change BZDB settings based on the amount of non-observer players
author: allejo

name: Player DB
description: The playerdb plugin interfaces with a web API to store and query player join information
author: blast

name: Score Restorer
description: Restores a player's score whenever they rejoin within a set amount of time
author: allejo

name: AOLer
description: Translation plugin that will convert regular chat to AOL 1337 speak
author: allejo

name: Staged Scene Generator
description: Allows setting up staged scenes with fixed tanks and shots. Useful for generating screenshots
author: blast

name: Map Change
description: Allows players to change the map
author: allejo

name: Geno Stats
description: Adds a command to the game that allows players to check on some simple statistics for Genocide flag usage
author: L4m3r

name: Flag Thief
description: Takes the flag from the killer whenever they make a kill and have a score of 4 or above
author: Zehra

name: Useless Geno
description: Causes the Useless flag to act like Genocide
author: Zehra

name: No Loss On SW
description: Players do not lose points on deaths from 'ShockWave' shot type
author: Zehra

name: Spawnkill Revenge
description: Discourages them by auto-killing the perpetrators of spawnkills
author: Agatha

name: Swear Suppressor
description: Block offending messages entirely when the language filter is triggered and notify the player
author: L4m3r
